flawed_nl_solution:
There were 12.6 - 4.6 = <<12.6-4.6=8>>8 gigabytes used after deleting some files.
Then, the used space went up to 8 + 2 = <<8+2=6>>6 gigabytes after storing other files.
Thus, the new 20 gigabytes external drive will have 20 - 6 = <<20-6=14>>14 gigabytes free.
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
